title: Bugsplat error on client startup
body:
This happened randomly and as far as I know, the only possible cause(That I can think of) could be from swapping from the legacy to the updated client several times. I can't get to the repair part on the client because it's right after clicking the .exe when I get the error. I don't want to reinstall if I don't have to, but it seems to be the best way to go about it any repairs. I don't know if this will help at all, seems like it should, but below is what I found in the LeagueClient logs folder. Any help or advice is appreciated, thanks! $$$$ <------ Here is some moneys 4 you


000000.000| ALWAYS| Logging started at 2017-03-04T11:58:33.981
000000.000| ALWAYS| Application Version:7.4.176.9146 - CL:1769146 - Build Date:Feb 17 2017 - Build Time:14:35:27
000000.000|   OKAY| Running in Launcher Mode (Version Switcher) from cwd 'C:\Riot Games\League of Legends'.
000000.000|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Patching::EnumerateInstalledReleases: (league_client_sln)
000000.000|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Patching::EnumerateInstalledReleases: Found candidate "0.0.0.20" (0x00000014).
000000.000|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Patching::EnumerateInstalledReleases: Failed to find OK-file, candidate is not valid
000000.000|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Patching::EnumerateInstalledReleases: Found candidate "0.0.0.23" (0x00000017).
000000.000|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Patching::EnumerateInstalledReleases: Found OK-file, candidate is valid
000000.000|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Patching::EnumerateInstalledReleases: Found candidate "0.0.0.24" (0x00000018).
000000.000|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Patching::EnumerateInstalledReleases: Found OK-file, candidate is valid
000000.000|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Patching::EnumerateInstalledReleases: Succeeded.
000000.001|   OKAY| Initial working directory: "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends"
000000.001|   OKAY| Current process: "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe"
000000.001|   OKAY| Command line arguments:
000000.001|   OKAY| Launching release '0.0.0.24'.
000000.001|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Common::SolutionManifest::Load: ("C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/league_client_sln/releases/0.0.0.24/solutionmanifest")
000000.001|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Common::SolutionManifest::Load: Succeeded
000000.001|  ERROR| Riot::Client::`anonymous-namespace'::RunRelease: R:/code/RiotClient/rClient/VersionLauncher.cpp(153): Cannot run latest release because file, "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/league_client/releases/0.0.0.54/deploy/LeagueClient.exe", does not exist
000000.001|  ERROR| Riot::Client::Launch: R:/code/RiotClient/rClient/VersionLauncher.cpp(411): Failed to run the latest release "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/league_client/releases/0.0.0.54/deploy/".

Riot::Client::Launch: R:/code/RiotClient/rClient/VersionLauncher.cpp(411): Failed to run the latest release "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/league_client/releases/0.0.0.54/deploy/".
Caused by:
  Riot::Client::`anonymous-namespace'::RunRelease: R:/code/RiotClient/rClient/VersionLauncher.cpp(153): Cannot run latest release because file, "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/league_client/releases/0.0.0.54/deploy/LeagueClient.exe", does not exist
000000.347|  ERROR| Crash Occurred

replies.body: These logs don't tell me a whole lot, but generally a bugsplat on client launch could indicate a security setting blocking it from loading.  As a first step, try our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your OS is allowing the patch and client to launch, or specific game files needed to do so.  I hope that helps!

Thanks for the quick response. After checking everything and reading those guides it seems like all I have left is to try and update Windows if re-installing League doesn't work. I'm okay with having to do that, so no worries. :} Thanks again
